hUnit is only possible thanks to the many great free and open-sourced software
projects that it leverages.

This includes:

   - Apache Commons-Lang and Commons-Logging, licenced under the Apache Software
     license.
     http://commons.apache.org

   - The Spring Framework, licenced under the Apache Software License.
     http://www.springsource.org/

   - ActiveMQ, licenced under the Apache Software License.
     http://activemq.apache.org/

   - The Crystal SVG Icon Set, licensed under the LGPL.
     http://www.everaldo.com/crystal/
